Articles.Content:
Inspired by Tanuki_Chau (yet another KSPTV Streamer who has inspired my plugins), here is the Conics Configurator plugin!

Con2 allows you to adjust the CONIC_PATCH_DRAW_MODE setting in-game, so no more editing the save file every time you install KSP to get Patch Mode 0! Just plop this plugin into your GameData folder and load up KSP!

The Conics Configurator window shows up on the main menu in the top-left corner of the screen.

Some Conics Explanations

The Conics system is what draws the orbit for each and every thing that moves (that includes singular parts as well as planets). The different modes draw orbits differently, but they all behave similarly.
